I would find another way to express my creativity.
i am a student living at home while pursuing my music industry degree.

I enjoy wearing comfortable, loose clothing that allows me to move around easily in my wheelchair.

participant_2.background:
I write poems about my life and my culture.
I like to read the news and write my own stories.
I'm working on finding a new job and trying to figure out what I want to do with my life.
i don t like feeling obligated to hang out with someone.
i am a writer.

content.text: It's going well, thanks. I'm just hanging out, watching TV. What about you?
Not much, just working on a new poem. I'm trying to figure out how to express my feelings about my culture in a way that's both creative and meaningful.
That sounds really interesting! I'm always impressed by people who can write poetry. I'm not very creative, so I just stick to cooking and music.
Cooking and music are both great creative outlets! I love to cook, but I'm not very good at it.
Neither am I! But it's fun to try new recipes and see what you can come up with.
Yeah, it's definitely a lot of trial and error. But it's worth it when you find something you really enjoy.
Exactly! So, what are you working on right now?
I'm working on a poem about my experience as a first-generation immigrant. I'm trying to capture the challenges and rewards of growing up in two different cultures.
That sounds really interesting! I'd love to read it when you're done.
Thanks! I'll be sure to send it to you.
Great! I'm looking forward to it.
